title: Seriously
body:
There are a lot of posts like this but... Why the **** do people play ranked when they say they have to go 20 mins in... I just lost my promos because of that... Can we put a ranked ban in place for people that leave games and afk in ranked... It seriously ruins the whole experience for everyone else in the game. The thing is I was playing support and we got this kayle fed hard... she had half the kills of the team, then she says guys gtg... UGH! we were winning but because she was our carry and she left we started to loose fights...
Riot pls make something so we can end afk's and leavers, it seriously doesn't make the game fun anymore

Hey Critterous,

We have a leaver buster system in place to punish people that regularly dc/afk during games. A few interesting points about leaver buster

*  Summoners who exhibit this behavior and have a trend of leaving/idling in games will be placed in a low priority queue.
* Ranked is treated much more severely than normal when it comes to leavers.

You can read more about it here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

It sounds like you have made up your mind about me as a person, so this probably won't change your mind but I am always on the boards talking to players. It's pretty demoralizing for me to have you straight up say I don't care.

We are working hard to combat negative player behaviour, I have entered countless boards discussions to talk and discuss about what we are working on. Not the person you were addressing, but often your first messages come out sounding like something you copy paste between threads, although what you say after that doesn't sound that way. You seem to put down a bit of a generic message and, while I can't blame you for that since it is addressing the questions, it can come off like you don't care to people who have read those very similar posts by you and haven't really gone through and read your further responses.

TL;DR I can't respond differently to slight variations of the same questions.

I agree my first response to some questions are extremely similar to previous answers. But that's probably because I comment in similar threads. If people ask what reporting does but in slightly different ways then I'm probably going to provide an answer that is very similar to older posts about reporting. If players ask about tribunal then my response is probably going to be very similar to previous answers about tribunal. If people talk about Elo Hell my discussion points will probably be similar to old Elo Hell posts.

But if they raise new points in further discussion and more comments I tend to take on the new information and thats where the discussion starts becoming different from the previous ones.

Yes, punish the people who do it, that's great.

But the people who had the AFK on their team still lose MMR.

Perhaps you could change the distribution of the penalty.

For example, if you went with a 50% subsidy for the first two leavers:
When a five man team loses, they lose 100% MMR.
If one person AFKs, the first loses 300% MMR, everyone else loses 50% MMR.
If two people AFK, the first loses 300% MMR, the second loses 125% MMR, the others lose 25% MMR.

Hey CandyVanisClosed,

From what I can see RAM RAM hasn't played a single game since 11/02/2015....I wonder why that is =P

In terms of the Leaver Buster System, leaving 1 game or getting reported in 1 game for afk/dc isn't going to get you put into low priority queue. Only if you consistently leave/dc or get reported as leave/dc over a number of games will you then be punished. Also note that players reports mean less if they send through a lot of false reports.

Hope this helps change your mind about things!
